events.message: I reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving my vehicle hitting a guardrail on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under 'Auto Accident' based on the details provided about the collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle collision claim and will reach out soon.
We have acknowledged your claim related to the car accident and are initiating the review process immediately.
Please provide a copy of the police report and pictures of your vehicle's damage to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including the police report and accident photos have been submitted to support your claim.
Our claims team has started the investigation into the circumstances of the collision involving your vehicle.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been successfully completed with all facts verified.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy coverage of your vehicle.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the proposed settlement and the professionalism of our claims agents.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms.
The payment corresponding to your approved claim has been issued and should reach your account shortly.
The claim has been closed successfully after completing payment and receiving all necessary confirmations.
